info.description:
Use this endpoints to manage your users data. The data will be restricted to your own (user,API key) pairs
https://api.tripgo.com/v1/data/user
info.title: User Data

tags.name: Card
tags.description: Endpoint for retrieving cards details and topping up money

tags.name: User
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving user profile data

tags.name: Phone
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving phone user data

tags.name: Email
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving email user data

tags.name: Push
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving push notification data

tags.name: Trip
tags.description: Endpoint for retrieving trips in JSON format

tags.name: Vehicles
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving Vehicles

tags.name: Favorites
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving Favorites

tags.name: CustomData
tags.description:
This endpoint will allow to get and save the custom app data of the users.
It should be filtered by IP when enabled on production, as it currently does not have any access restriction

tags.name: EventsInfo
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving EventsInfo

tags.name: Habituals
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving Habituals

tags.name: History
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving history search items

tags.name: LocationKeys
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving Location Keys

tags.name: TripItem
tags.description: Endpoint for saving and retrieving Trip Items

post.summary: Adds a notification condition to a given card

parameters.name: card
parameters.description: the provider card number to be queried

401.description: Not allowed to access this resource

get.summary: Get all the provider account cards
get.description: Inspects a provider account and returns all active card numbers and summary balances

parameters.name: update
parameters.description: set to 'force' to ignore cached values

299.description: Intermediate response, keep hitting this endpoint and you will get a 200

401.description: Not allowed to access this resource

get.summary: Testing push notifications, will push notification

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: CARD_BALANCE_LOWER_THAN for money and PASS_EXPIRATION_IN for pass

get.description: Returns details associated with a single provider card number

parameters.name: update
parameters.description: set to 'force' to ignore cached values

parameters.name: card
parameters.description: the [rovider card number to be queried

401.description: Not allowed to access this resource

get.summary: Get all the events info of the user
Get all the favorites of the user

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the new favorite data, can be partial

get.summary: Get all the habituals of the user

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the new habitual data, can be partial

get.summary: Get the history list of the user
Get all the location keys of the user

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the new trip item data, can be partial

get.summary: Get all the trip items of the user

get.description: Get the list of trips for a user from the database
Given a specific user, will return the app data

post.description: Will save the customData of a specific user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the phone to delete

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: new user data, can be partial

get.description: required email address to send the extracted data

delete.description: required email address to send message when the data

get.description: return the list of devices registered for the given user

post.description: Add/update a device/platform specific token for push notifications, note that you need to send a per user unique deviceId. We will only keep one token per (user,deviceid)

delete.description: Remove a device/platform specific token for push notifications.

get.summary: Get all the vehicles of the user

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the new vehicle data, can be partial

post.description: checks the validity of an alias token
by sending an email with a url to validate the alias email

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: to add as alias to the user account

API key.description: Identifies your app, get an API key in https://tripgo.3scale.net/signup?plan_ids[]=2357356192718
API key.name: X-TripGo-Key

User Token.description: Identifies your user, use /specs/userAuth to get this userToken
User Token.name: userToken

money.description: money settings and notifications (values in cents)

pass.description: pass settings and notifications (values in days)
expiry date and time (ISO8601) of current provider pass

updatedAt.description: Date and time (ISO8601) results fetched from provider

cardType.description: Type of card, e.g. Full Fare

cardExpiry.description: Expiry date (ISO8601) of the card (not to be confused with provider pass)

moneyPending.description: provider money amount to be added to card at next touch on

passPending.description: Duration in days of provider pass to be added to card at next touch on

lastTransactionDate.description: Date and time (ISO8601) of last transaction on this provider card

connected.description: whether the account is connected or not

username.description: The username must be a valid email address

JsonEventInfo.description: Represents information about an event in the agenda

type.description: this type field will determine the fields that will be available : location, stop, query, trip

arriveBy.description: true if the trip time is for the arriveBy, false or missing for leaveAt

garage.description: Represents a Favorite Location, including a place and a list of vehicles garaged at that location.

JsonSearchHistory.description:
Represents a Search History item, including name, address, source and lat,lng.
Will automatically add dateAdded and dateUpdated values, and count the number of updates.
Will keep a max of 30 elements per user and merge items with equal (lat,lng) using 5 decimal digits of precision

JsonEmail_ApiV2.description: Represents a user email, it can be set as primary and may be validated or not

JsonEventInfo_ApiV2.description: Represents information about an event in the agenda

arriveBy.description: true if the trip time is for the arriveBy, false or missing for leaveAt

type.description: this type field will determine the fields that will be available : location, stop, query, trip

JsonOpting_ApiV2.description: Represents opting's booleans for the user, must all be sent together when updating it

JsonProfileWeights_ApiV2.description: Represents the user preferences about how to combine the various components of a trip's quality into a single figure

JsonSearchHistory_ApiV2.description:
Represents a Search History item, including name, address, source and lat,lng.
Will automatically add dateAdded and dateUpdated values, and count the number of updates.
Will keep a max of 30 elements per user and merge items with equal (lat,lng) using 5 decimal digits of precision

currency.description: preferred currency of the user. Currencies are identified by their ISO4217 currency codes. Visit the wikipedia ISO web site for more information, including a table of currency codes.

appData.description: Represents any app specific data values for a user, must all be sent together when updating it

vehicles.description:
Retrieve the list of vehicles
Cannot be used to update the vehicles, for that you need to use the /vehicle endpoint.

favorites.description:
Retrieve the list of favorites
Cannot be used to update the favorites, for that you need to use the /favorite endpoint.

searchHistory.description:
Retrieve the list of history items
Cannot be used to update the history search terms, for that you need to use the /history endpoint.

habituals.description:
Retrieve the list of habituals
Cannot be used to update the habituals, for that you need to use the /habituals endpoint.

phones.description:
Retrieve the list of phones
Cannot be used to update the phones, for that you need to use the user endpoints.

locationKeys.description:
Retrieve the list of location keys
Cannot be used to update the location keys, for that you need to use the /locationkey endpoint.

eventInfos.description:
Retrieve the list of event infos
Cannot be used to update the events info, for that you need to use the /eventinfo endpoint.

tripItems.description:
Retrieve the list of trip items
Cannot be used to update the trip items, for that you need to use the /tripitem endpoint.

JsonEmail.description: Represents a user email, it can be set as primary and may be validated or not

JsonOpting.description: Represents opting's booleans for the user, must all be sent together when updating it

JsonProfileWeights.description: Represents the user preferences about how to combine the various components of a trip's quality into a single figure

deviceId.description: a unique id for that user/device pair

currency.description: preferred currency of the user. Currencies are identified by their ISO4217 currency codes. Visit the wikipedia ISO web site for more information, including a table of currency codes.

appData.description: Represents any app specific data values for a user, must all be sent together when updating it

habituals.description:

pendingValidation.description: Retrieve the list of emails pending validation.

aliases.description:
Retrieve the list of email aliases
Cannot be used to update the aliases, for that you need to use the account endpoints.

phones.description: Update phone, enable to use for the case when you keep only one Phone number for the user, the list must contain just one phone

emails.description: Update email, enable to use for the case when you keep only one Email for the user, the list must contain just one email, validation email won't be sent and it will be keeped as primary not validated. To send validation email use POST /email/{email}

locationKeys.description:
Retrieve the list of location keys
Cannot be used to update the location keys, for that you need to use the /locationkey endpoint.

eventInfos.description:
Retrieve the list of event infos
Cannot be used to update the events info, for that you need to use the /eventinfo endpoint.

tripItems.description:
Retrieve the list of trip items
Cannot be used to update the trip items, for that you need to use the /tripitem endpoint.
